_comment: Boundaries Layer (P1.4) — Domain crossing rules. Set allowed=false to block a crossing; requires_interface=true to enforce contract.

rules.name: all_to_observation
rules.description: Any domain may emit telemetry/metrics (read-only push)

rules.name: control_to_execution
rules.description: Control plane may dispatch execution via defined interface only

rules.name: execution_to_data
rules.description: Execution may persist results but must use data interface

rules.name: security_to_any
rules.description: Security layer has full read-inspect access across all domains

rules.name: data_to_control_blocked
rules.description: Raw data CANNOT directly trigger control decisions — must pass through evaluation

rules.name: execution_to_external
rules.description: Outbound external calls must use declared connector interfaces

rules.name: external_to_data
rules.description: Inbound external data must be routed through validated ingestion interface

rules.name: external_to_control_blocked
rules.description: External systems CANNOT directly influence control decisions
